    public static class AnnotationOutputter.Options
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      TreePrint constituencyTreePrinter
      How to print a constituency tree for display.
      int coreferenceContextSize
      Should a small window of context be provided with each coreference mention
      TreePrint dependencyTreePrinter
      How to print a dependency tree by default for display.
      java.lang.String encoding
      The output encoding to use
      boolean includeText
      Should the document text be included as part of the XML output
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends CoreAnnotation<?>>> keysToPrint
      Columns to print in CoNLL output.
      boolean pretty
      If false, try to compress whitespace as much as possible to minimize the size of the output.
      boolean printFakeDeps
      Print some fake dependency info in the CoNLL output.
      boolean printSingletons
      If false, will print only non-singleton entities
      double relationsBeam
      Provides a beam score cutoff on whether relations are printed (in XMLOutputter and TextOutputter from edu.stanford.nlp.ie.machinereading.structure.RelationMention).

    • Field Detail

      • includeText

        public final boolean includeText
        Should the document text be included as part of the XML output

      • encoding

        public final java.lang.String encoding
        The output encoding to use

      • pretty

        public final boolean pretty
        If false, try to compress whitespace as much as possible to minimize the size of the output. This is particularly useful for sending over the wire. If true, the outputters should pretty-print the output.

      • constituencyTreePrinter

        public final TreePrint constituencyTreePrinter
        How to print a constituency tree for display.

      • dependencyTreePrinter

        public final TreePrint dependencyTreePrinter
        How to print a dependency tree by default for display.

      • coreferenceContextSize

        public final int coreferenceContextSize
        Should a small window of context be provided with each coreference mention

      • printSingletons

        public final boolean printSingletons
        If false, will print only non-singleton entities

      • relationsBeam

        public final double relationsBeam
        Provides a beam score cutoff on whether relations are printed (in XMLOutputter and TextOutputter from edu.stanford.nlp.ie.machinereading.structure.RelationMention).

      • keysToPrint

        public final java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends CoreAnnotation<?>>> keysToPrint
        Columns to print in CoNLL output.

      • printFakeDeps

        public final boolean printFakeDeps
        Print some fake dependency info in the CoNLL output. Useful for the original conll eval script, for example
